product_name: Sea to Summit Travelling Light TPU Clear Zip Top Pouch
long_description: Instead of cramming all of your liquids into a plastic ziplock bag for airport security, use this TSA-approved Travelling Light Clear Zip Top pouch from Sea to Summit. It will last through hundreds of trips and prevent hundreds of plastic bags from ending up in landfills. Travelling Light Zip Top pouch sports a leak-resistant zipper and spill-proof lids. Made of thermoplastic urethane (TPU) material for exceptional durability. Welded construction with a durable YKK(R) leak-resistant zipper. Grab tabs for easy opening and closing. Includes three 3 fl. oz. and three 1.3 fl. oz. Sea to Summit leakproof bottles.
short_description: Instead of cramming all of your liquids into a plastic ziplock bag for airport security, use this TSA-approved Travelling Light Clear Zip Top pouch from Sea to Summit.
